string-array.name: itemSongs
string-array.item: Om mani padme hum(六字大明咒)
Om mani padme hum by Karmapa(六字大明咒)

string-array.name: itemSongs1
string-array.item: 一切如来心秘密全身舍利宝箧印陀罗尼咒

string-array.name: itemSongsInfo
string-array.item: Om mani padme hum is a mantra particularly associated with the four-armed Shadakshari form of Avalokiteshvara. Mani means the jewel and Padma-the lotus. It is the six syllabled mantra of the bodhisattva of compassion, Avalokiteshvara

Om mani padme hum is a mantra particularly associated with the four-armed Shadakshari form of Avalokiteshvara. Mani means the jewel and Padma-the lotus. It is the six syllabled mantra of the bodhisattva of compassion, Avalokiteshvara
According to the Larger Sūtra of Immeasurable Life (Mahāyāna Amitāyus Sūtra) Amitābha was, in very ancient times and possibly in another system of worlds, a monk named Dharmakāra

This is the mantra of Wen Shu wisdom. Also known as Wen Shu mantra. Wisdom Wen Shu Mantra to open our wisdom. You can read a long break this oath is usually in the wisdom of emptiness will slowly open the door, all the best.
Often recite the Green Tara Mantra, you can remove the root of samsara, free of all demons, plagues complaint. Green Tara Mantra, where physical and mental pain and suffering is the best choice.

string-array.name: itemSongsCont
string-array.item: Om Amitabha hrih, Om Amitabha Arya Siddhi Hum Hrih
ong bei-xia-jie bar-na xia-wa-re sa-war-zuo-ra za-xia-ma-na-a suo-ha
Om Ban Ja Sa Do Hum
die ya ta ong bei kan ze bei kan ze
ōng，bō là mò lín tuó níng，suō pó hē。

string-array.name: itemSongsCont1
string-array.item: die ya ta ong bei kan ze bei kan ze
